TopicTitle: Mk2 Lander Can - No Kerbal Faces in right corner

Articles.Content:
I have a lander in orbit of Minmus with the Mk2 Lander Can. Used it 2 times without problems. Now I returned to build a base, transfered 2 kerbals and landed, when I noted that I can't see their faces in the right corner, and can't EVA. First I thought it was a bug with the vessel, but creating a new vessel resulted in the same problem. The bug is with the Mk2 Lander Can.

Everything indicates that are kerbals in there, USI-LS, chatterer, crew leds, etc. When docked to another ship, the "Interior Overlay" don't work in the Mk2 Lander Can, only in other pods. Internal view also don't work, and the Kerbals in there still don't appear, but I can transfer them.

Searching I found out that I can left-click on the door, and then EVA them normally. But I should be worried?

I removed some recently installed mods, created new save, and replaced the folder GameData\Squad\Parts\Command\mk2LanderCan with a fresh one, nothing helps.

Recently I pruned some stock parts with Janitor, I fear that I might pruned some texture used in it's interior. The only command pod I pruned is the Mk3 (the shuttle one), I suspect the lander can uses some texture of it.

But everything it uses seems to be in it's folder. Or there is anything outside? Can someone help me with that?

Thanks!!
